The solemn, important hours intervening between us and the judgment are not to be employed in warfare with believers. This is Satan's work; he began it in heaven, and he has with unabated energy kept it up ever since his fall. "But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another." Let there not be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief. The time
                                                                           1010
has come when the cry of the faithful watchman is to be heard, calling to his fellow watchmen, "What of the night?" to be answered, "The morning cometh, and also the night."
